alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 3:11AM MST until January 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Western Uinta Basin. * WHEN...From 5 PM MST this afternoon to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on many area routes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest snow totals will occur in higher elevation portions of the western end of the Basin, will lowest totals expected in the lower elevation portions from Duchesne eastward. While snow is favored through the period, there is a low probability for a mix of rain or freezing rain from late Saturday afternoon through Saturday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
